history.proof: intros p a l b Hin. induction p as [| (x,y) p' IHp]. - simpl. destruct Hin. - simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a x) eqn:H. + reflexivity. + apply IHp. destruct Hin; [congruence | assumption].

ctx: intros p a l b Hin.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "eqA_dec a x" in the current goal.

ctx: intros p a l b Hin.

original: intros p a l b Hin. induction p as [| (x,y) p' IHp]. - simpl. intros. destruct Hin. - simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a x) eqn:H. + simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity. + apply IHp. * destruct Hin; [congruence | assumption]. * apply H.
